duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quality customer service and support via phone and online channels.
Effectively communicate with customers to address inquiries and resolve issues.
Navigate computer systems to access and update customer information.
Manage multiple tasks simultaneously while maintaining high attention to detail.
Work as part of a team to ensure customer satisfaction and uphold company standards.
Adhere to company policies and procedures to maintain a professional and positive customer experience.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Associate's degree preferred)
